title: PM e-drive scheme to aid in faster adoption of EVs: M&M, Tata Motors
description: Indian auto giants Mahindra & Mahindra and Tata Motors have praised the PM e-drive scheme, which aims to boost electric vehicle adoption with a Rs 14,335 crore outlay. The initiative includes subsidies for electric two-wheelers, three-wheelers, buses, ambulances, and trucks, aiming for higher EV penetration and a greener future.
